Token.Abstract: Application configuration stored in OMCe. The configuration's property values can be changed after the client app has been published.
Returns a BOOL for the specified property. Returns the specified default value if the property is absent.

Parameter.Name: property
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the property, as specified on the server by the mobile backend.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value returned if the property is not specified.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSInteger for the specified property. Returns the specified default value if the property is absent.

Parameter.Name: property
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the property, as specified on the server by the mobile backend.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value returned if the property is not specified.

Token.Abstract: Returns a double for the specified property. Returns the specified default value if the property is absent.

Parameter.Name: property
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the property, as specified on the server by the mobile backend.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value returned if the property is not specified.

Token.Abstract: Returns an NSNumber for the specified property. Returns the specified default value if the property is absent.

Parameter.Name: property
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the property, as specified on the server by the mobile backend.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value returned if the property is not specified.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string for the specified property. Returns the specified default value if the property is absent.

Parameter.Name: property
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the property, as specified on the server by the mobile backend.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value returned if the property is not specified.
